mapper.select: select c.start_period,c.work_place_name, e.hourly_wage from Employee e,Contract c where e.C_code= c.C_code AND c.p_id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(rownum) FROM Employee WHERE M_code=#{m_code} AND rownum > 0

SELECT start_period,work_place_name,hourly_wage FROM (SELECT rownum rn, c.start_period,c.work_place_name,e.hourly_wage from Employee e,Contract c where e.C_code= c.C_code AND c.p_id=#{id} order by c.start_period desc) WHERE rn >= #{pageStart} AND rn <= (#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum})

SELECT s.BASIC_SALARY, s.FOOD_EXPENSES, s.TRANSPORTATION_FEE, s.YEAR_MONTH, s.ACTUAL_SALARY, s.TOTAL_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, s.ADDITIONAL_EXTENDED, s.ADDITIONAL_NIGHT, s.em_code, c.work_place_name FROM SALARY s, EMPLOYEE e, contract c WHERE s.em_code = e.em_code AND e.m_code = c.p_id AND e.c_code = c.c_code AND e.m_code = #{m_code}

SELECT BASIC_SALARY, FOOD_EXPENSES, TRANSPORTATION_FEE, YEAR_MONTH, ACTUAL_SALARY, TOTAL_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, ADDITIONAL_EXTENDED, ADDITIONAL_NIGHT, em_code, work_place_name, work_hours, work_minute FROM salary_view WHERE m_code = 'p'||SUBSTR(#{id},INSTR(#{id},'/')+1) AND SUBSTR(em_code,0,INSTR(em_code,'/')-1) = SUBSTR(#{id},0,INSTR(#{id},'/')-1)
